Knuckles Mountain Range.title: Knuckles Mountain Range
Knuckles Mountain Range.byline: The Knuckles Mountain Range is in Central Sri Lanka.

Knutsford.title: Knutsford
Knutsford.byline: Knutsford is a very pleasant town of 13,000 people (2021) in Cheshire spoilt only by its position under Manchester Airport's flight path.
